website_summaries.verdict: The Altra Instinct 4.0 is the Intuition’s (women’s only) equivalent for the men’s version. It offers many of Altra’s renowned technologies like the ZeroDrop and the FootShape technologies. With the 6th instalment of the Instinct, runners can get a shoe that has ample protection for many miles on the road, intense workouts in the gym, and easy recovery sessions. It is a versatile workhorse that can take on different tasks, especially for those who are working around a budget.
pros: Generally, runners were very happy with the comfortable ride of the Instinct 4.0
There is a natural space for the placement of the foot
The new version is significantly more breathable than the past model, based on several opinions of reviewers
Some runners loved its long-mileage capacity
More than a handful were very happy with its ability to be a gym option
There were those who said that the shoe was light enough for speed runs and for piling on the miles
The 6th iteration of the Altra Instinct (starts with 1, 1.5, 2, 2.5 etc.)
is very smooth and well-cushioned, according to some runners
The price is bang for the buck, as appreciated by a good number of runners
Excellent grip on different surfaces is also mentioned by a moderate number of runners
It looks much better than the past model, as commented by a handful of reviewers
cons: The forefoot and toe box is a bit too loose, according to some runners
A few said that the upper is a bit sloppy

customer_reviews.title: A "natural fit"
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shoe for people who want a more natural fit. By that I mean, heel on par with the toe (no heel raise) - just like natural walking or running. Or... I mean a wider toe box than heel. Nearly all running shoes have a wider heel than toe area - yet naturally we've evolved to spread out our toes for balance. There's a little bit of cushioning; so not like the "barefoot" shoes out there - a tribute to the fact that nearly all of us are used to wearing cushioned shoes when running. I highly recommend if you're looking for that "natural fit"
customer_reviews.author: Avid Readers

customer_reviews.title: Wide toe box, buy at least 1/2 size bigger,
customer_reviews.text: its an everyday shoe. The look is clean and the comfort is superb. Cushioning is just right for work, I teach and have these on all day and I don't feel tired like I did with my Rockports. Sizing is off since the 13 fit best, I usually wore size 12 in Asics. If you do commit to these style of shoes, be prepared to toss every other shoe you have since they will feel so much more narrow. Hope these last.
customer_reviews.author: Tomas

customer_reviews.title: Order half a size bigger for this version.
customer_reviews.text: Love this version of Altra Instinct! As for sizing, I ordered a half size bigger than what I normally use and it's perfect. Just enough cushion but not too much. Great for treadmill runs as well as road runs. I also use it for gym workouts (HIIT classes, weight lifting), as well as boot camp style workouts. Used it as a walking shoe while at Disney world and my feet felt great. I love this version so much I bought the blue and black color schemes as well so I can have a rotation. I highly recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Chisnax

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for ultras or just a quick jog!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes, great fit and comfort for long runs! Zero drop is exactly what you need for neutral running and the shoes have held up for hundreds of miles. The fit is a little small so I recommend a half size to full size bigger than your normal shoe. Overall an easy recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Great but one flaw
customer_reviews.text: I have been an Altra fan for nearly two years, owning 4 or 5 pairs. This is my first pair of the instinct 4. This shoe has a great feel and is a joy to run in. The only reason it is not 5 stars is that parts of the tread began to fall off around 45 miles in. My experience with Altra shoes is generally 200-250 miles before signs of wear. These started​ prematurely. I'm not saying don't buy, just be aware that Altra uses very soft rubber and it can break down quicker than average shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Williams

customer_reviews.title: fit true to size
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice and comfortable running shoes. I love the wide toe box, and I like that they breathe pretty well and keep my feet reasonably cool. But I wish I had not sized up 1/2 size. They fit pretty much true to size. Based on reviews about the fit, I sized up 1/2 size, but am getting some heel slip as a result, and unfortunately I had already worn them too much to be able to return them by the time I realized it was a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Love Altras but a slight size difference.
customer_reviews.text: The support is significantly more noticeable than the Altra One's, which had a minimalist support. The sizing is smaller than than what I would purchase for minimalist Altra's though. The size 9.5 for these shoes feel like size 9 or 8.5 for Altra minimalist Ones. It still fits though and is holding sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Celery

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes for my 70-year old feet.
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoes - very similar to my Instinct 1.5's I like the big toe box on the 1.5's so I felt safe ordering the new version. My 1.5's are 9 1/2 and my toe is close to the end, so I ordered 10's. My toes still seem close to the end, but the shoes are just as comfortable as the 1.5's - maybe after some wear they'll stretch a little.
customer_reviews.author: PRB

customer_reviews.title: Plates, screws and pins are no longer an issue for this guy, we’ve got a runner!
customer_reviews.text: I spiral fractured my left ankle 2 years ago and have nerve damage in my foot along with screws, plates and pins. I have had lots of problems trying to find a shoe that give me the room I need in the foot box and can run in. Altra shoes are amazing. The instinct are my second pair, pulled them right out of the box and ran 4 miles with minimal discomfort in my foot and ankle. Looking forward to many more miles!
customer_reviews.author: Cory P.

customer_reviews.title: A good shoe, just but a larger size than you might think
customer_reviews.text: Less comfortable than the older models. Also smaller for, as many have noted. Still one of the only brands that understands the value of a wider toe box and a zero drop without losing critical cushioning and support. I'll continue to buy and recommend these shoes although I'll move up a full size next time.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Two small size is not consistent with the brand
customer_reviews.text: I have already bought about 4 pairs of the Altra shoes and all were a size 8. this one came and was too small. waiting for the 8.5 to arrive now. I hope these are good like the previous A;tra shoes I own. Not sure why the sizing changed so much
customer_reviews.author: this & that

customer_reviews.title: My feet feel great
customer_reviews.text: I love wearing these sneakers. I'm new to zero drop footwear that are wide enough to allow your feet to spread out. My feet feel great when I walk around. I have yet to run in them. I'll update my review when I do.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Order one size bigger...or half?
customer_reviews.text: Solid looking. They ran small. I own two other pairs (lone peak & superior) that fit exactly the same (10.5US). Ordered these the same, but the big toe was rubbing. Altra needs to get that $#!+ straight so consumers don’t waste time & dinero.
customer_reviews.author: Kal Skirata

customer_reviews.title: A bit larger than 3.5 Instinct
customer_reviews.text: The new version seemed to be a bit of a larger fit than the 3.5 Instinct, so I returned. These may work out for others.
customer_reviews.author: Donald A. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: But the Altra Instinct is the most comfortable shoe I have ever worn
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a runner. But the Altra Instinct is the most comfortable shoe I have ever worn. I love the roomy toe area. I originally purchased the Instinct 1 about 4 years ago and just replaced it with the Instinct 4. I order a half size larger than what I wear in "regular" shoes. I'm glad Altra finally made an Instinct in Black, but now they need to make a white one.
customer_reviews.author: R. Karr

customer_reviews.title: your feet will thank you
customer_reviews.text: Went from Instinct 1.5 to this 4.0 and it is a great shoe. I did check with Altra and they recommended to go 1/2 size larger than my Instinct 1.5's and the fit is good. Been using minimalist and zero drop shoes for more than 4 years now and love it, no longer use orthotics for flat feet!
customer_reviews.author: najnad

customer_reviews.title: Great for training and racing.
customer_reviews.text: I've been running in Altra Instincts for years, beginning with model #2. They've been very good shoes and these promise to continue that trend. I especially appreciate the new fabric on the uppers and the comfortable interior.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk

customer_reviews.title: The road shoe seem to suffer from a large size ...
customer_reviews.text: The road shoe seem to suffer from a large size disparity. I ordered an 11.5 initially which is what I wear in this brand for trail shoes, and it was too small. I returned and ordered a 12, still too small, so its an inconvenient disparity that has been ver frustrating to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: MAnuel G.

customer_reviews.title: I am very disappointed that the size did run small in this shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of running shoes from this brand, I am very disappointed that the size did run small in this shoe, I went with size 11.5 for the other shoes and decided to go to a size 12 for more room. Definitely did not get that, now I'm out the cost of these shoes and now I have to buy new running shoes to replace my new running shoes. Definitely recommend going with a shoe company that can deliver consistency.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Gurnsey

customer_reviews.title: No size consistency.
customer_reviews.text: Altra needs to step up their game and be consistent with sizes. I started off with size 13s a few years ago and had to move up to 14s. Now those are getting tighter. The inside heels always wear out quickly.
customer_reviews.author: LAWSONRANGER

customer_reviews.title: Size runs small compared to other Altra shoes
customer_reviews.text: I could see these shoes were too small when I pulled them from the box. I own two other pairs of Altras - Lone Peak 2.5 and Superior 4.5, both size 10 1/2. The last on the Instinct is different than those used on the Lone Peak and Superior. So, I plan to try another road shoe like the Escalante, which has the same performance last as the Superior.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Instinct 1 not a bad first attempt but a bit inflexible
customer_reviews.text: My fifth pair of Altras. Instinct 1 not a bad first attempt but a bit inflexible. 1.5s (x2) better, but the upper material disintegrated badly. 2.0 too spongy and caused me ankle issues - I threw them out half worn when the Instinct 4 proved a vastly better proposition. My feet report these 4's as just right - supportive and very smooth but not too soft. Plus of course the usual Altra benefits of zero drop and wide toe box if you care about such things. I seriously love these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: adas

customer_reviews.title: Neutral running shoe with a wide forefoot box.
customer_reviews.text: Wide toe box for those in search of a wide shoe. No heel-to-forefoot drop, although the cushioning makes this a hard concept to pin down accurately.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: 5 and probably my favorite running shoes to date
customer_reviews.text: These are a definite improvement over the Instinct 3.5 and probably my favorite running shoes to date. My only gripe is that they seem a bit shorter front to back than the 3.5, I've owned both in size 11. So maybe go up a half size. Haven't blackened any toenails, but my toes are disturbingly close to end of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Brian M Hampton

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal all around athletic shoes. Use them to work out sprint distance run play sports. Great toe space fit snug but don’t squeeze or pinch anywhere. Wish I could have had more color options but the build of the shoe is fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Treehouse Kid

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: podiatrist recommended these for hallux rigidus and they really work .awesome
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie E freeman

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, but buy a 1/2 size up.
customer_reviews.text: Nice medium cushion shoe. Good shoe for the wide-footed. This shoe fits about a half size small though, I have another style of Altra's which are size 12, and I needed a size 12.5 for these.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Hutton

customer_reviews.title: Best All-Around Altra Shoe
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite cross-trainer. They have become my all around daily shoe as well. These shoes are great for everything from high intensity gym work to squats, deadlifts, and even longer road runs. I tried on the Escalante at my local specialty running store to gauge my size and these were a bit smaller than those and my Superior 3.0, but still fit good and give my toes room to work.
customer_reviews.author: Forrest

customer_reviews.title: Optimal balance between padding and still light . wide toe box.
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe - wearing it whenever I can. Medium sole and padded material are great for comfortable feeling but still sits well on my foot. Wide toe box is great for my feet - having wide shape of foot I find these fitting very well . Did several runs between 4-10 K - great feeling of balance between soft cushion and still feeling the road and pretty light. Can't recommend more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still love the wide toe box
customer_reviews.text: Originally had the Instinct 2 and moved on to the Olympus and Lone Peak because I would prefer the full rubber sole. This model also has the full rubber sole. It feels much more refined the than Instinct 2 (less slop/play) although it has a firmer sole. Still love the wide toe box!
customer_reviews.author: Zachar Hillman

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.  Love the room.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit great. They are light and comfortable to run in. This is my second pair of altras. I don't have many miles on the shoes yet so I don't know how they will hold up. These are the most comfortable shoes I have worn
customer_reviews.author: J. Fauth

customer_reviews.title: Great Running Shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are my second pair of Altra Instincts. Great running shoes that makes a difference. Amazon had a very good price as well. I knew the size to order as I had used Altra before. You need to go to the web site and learn about the Altra philosophy in shoe design. Basically, let your feet get accoustomed to the shoe for initial few runs.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and durable
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are comfy and durable and I can run in them. My feet feel great!
customer_reviews.author: Zelda Este

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe...runs small
customer_reviews.text: Shoe is very comfortable. Sizing runs small. About a full size small. I normally wear men's 10.5. With this shoe, I need 11.5.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Anglin

customer_reviews.title: My first run with them (straight out of the box) was 14 miles and my feet felt great after. I highly recommend these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I've been running on Altra's for about two years now. I usually run in Provisions but decided to try the Instinct 4. My first run with them (straight out of the box) was 14 miles and my feet felt great after. I highly recommend these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Brian B.

customer_reviews.title: Order a size up.
customer_reviews.text: Nice Shoe, but definitely runs small. Got a size 7 for my 12 year old son who wears a size 7 Nike with a thumbnail of room from his toe to the end. These, his toes were right to the end. We are going to try an 8 and hope that works!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A comfortable and durable shoe. Great for running and Crossfit! Bought 2 pair, very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Love my Altras
customer_reviews.text: I have been running in Altras for years. I bought the 4.5’s and was a little disappointed. I bought these to see if it was just a model issue and it was - these fit and perform as expected, the 4.5’s just didn’t fit me as well
customer_reviews.author: BryanS

customer_reviews.title: Comfy ride on longer runs.
customer_reviews.text: Only 30 miles in, but so far I love this shoe! I've been running in minimalist Merrells for a few years after a switch to the barefoot style of running helped clear up knee problems that recurred frequently during runs. Due to the lack of cushioning in those shoes, however, I still had plenty knee and foot soreness the day after longer runs. These Altras are still compatible with a more barefoot/mid-foot strike, but have the cushioning to easily support 10+ mile runs in comfort. The roomier toebox is nice as well. Plus, it's a much lighter shoe than one would expect from looking at it.
customer_reviews.author: Brad U.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the 0 drop sole. They look like they can handle many miles... we'll see in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Berchet

customer_reviews.title: I will probably order another pair because the fit and comfort are fantastic but right now my heel is rubbing against hard ...
customer_reviews.text: Wore through the fabric and padding after 6 months of walking around the city. I will probably order another pair because the fit and comfort are fantastic but right now my heel is rubbing against hard plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J Meyers

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my Husband. The shoes run smaller then normal sized shoes, but the quality of the shoe is really great! My Husband has size 14 feet and I ordered him a 15 and they fit perfectly! As soon as he got them, he pulled them from the box and went on a run and loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Allykay

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 9 but 9 1?2 fits perfectly. I love these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: phil

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Well built, and comfortable after a few weeks of use, but I would suggest ordering a half size larger. They are almost too small for me at a mens 9.5
customer_reviews.author: Aware

customer_reviews.title: Altra
customer_reviews.text: good shoes, but a bit snug which is unusual for Altras since I buy them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: rtjackucla

customer_reviews.title: Great for street and trail
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for hitting just the pavement and the trails. Fit is a touch small as I got a little toe bang which I don't with other Altras.
customer_reviews.author: A&PT

customer_reviews.title: The shoes are excellent, however
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are excellent, however, they are almost a bit small. If you are unsure about the fit go a half size up.
customer_reviews.author: user1776

customer_reviews.title: Runs small, sent back for a larger pair. ...
customer_reviews.text: Runs small, sent back for a larger pair. Got refund instead, though they were in stock with larger sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Sudduth

customer_reviews.title: Forth pair of Instincts, just started using them will ...
customer_reviews.text: Forth pair of Instincts, just started using them will wait and see how they hold up. Chronic knee pain disappeared using the zero drop type of shoe six years ago, still swear by the design.
customer_reviews.author: David Fry

customer_reviews.title: Your feet actually can breathe!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect shoes for running and exercise, your feet actually can breathe!
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Jordan Shotts

customer_reviews.title: Buy 1/2 size bigger
customer_reviews.text: I've always loved Altra. I buy a half size up every time because they do run small. I'm a 10.5 and the 11's are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff E

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe but buy a whole size bigger.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe! The natural foot shape and zero drop are exactly what I was looking for. I will be buying more Altra shoes in the future. It does run small. I’m typically a size 11 but had to get a 12.
customer_reviews.author: Chris F.

customer_reviews.title: Other then that nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: Way to small sent them back. And I've been running in altras for years I don't know what's up with these! If you buy them just know you've got to order a full size up. Other then that nice shoes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I then got the Torin model and I'm much happier.
customer_reviews.text: The little yellow pads on the sole start to come off with use. I then got the Torin model and I'm much happier.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Best walking shoe ever.
customer_reviews.text: Love these cushy shoes. Like running in house shoes. I wear 12E and 12.5 fit perfectly. The light color stays clean looking.
customer_reviews.author: Stanly

customer_reviews.title: Good for 30 days, junk after
customer_reviews.text: They were good for the 1st month and then they started to fall apart. The inside of the heal disintegrated which gave me a nasty rub mark on my ankle. The bottom of the shoe started to come apart soon after.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Instinct line. I have wide feet, and even though these don't come in 2E sizes, they fit fine.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

customer_reviews.title: Altra needs to ensure correct size label. This is third time. v
customer_reviews.text: Though size I ordered,was,sent it is not that size which I teied. Too small and narrow.
customer_reviews.author: joe winsett

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed cause I love the shoe otherwise
customer_reviews.text: Uppers are too tight. I have been wearing instinct for past 3 or 4 versions. Sole of shoe seems unchanged. But upper is tighter and I have callous on outside of one foot that now rubs. Very disappointed cause I love the shoe otherwise. I try not to tie tight to help.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shorter than other models
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe and brand however this model ran 1/2 size small compared to other Atras.
customer_reviews.author: 10splayer

customer_reviews.title: I love the altra low heel bed and wide toe box
customer_reviews.text: I love the altra low heel bed and wide toe box. I use these shoes for lots of walks and my feet just feel right in them. Used to buy New Balance for the wide width, but the heel bed was too high.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Best running shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes I've only gone on one 5 mile run but know they'll be awesome for at least 500 miles. I had the instinct 3.0 before and lived them too!
customer_reviews.author: lynn

customer_reviews.title: Stoke level high
customer_reviews.text: Friggin' love these guys. I thought because of the toe box they'd look a lot goofier than they actually do in real life.
customer_reviews.author: connor c.

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I like Altra running shoes, but they need to get the sizing right.
customer_reviews.author: El_Ryano

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I own several pairs of altra and these once again exceed my expectations. The soles are not as thick as others but the cushion is super soft, sturdy, and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Plastic heel support exposed
customer_reviews.text: Wore these for about 200 miles, and the heels wore out inside revealing a plastic support that rubs on the attachment of the achilles. Great shoe other wise, but am getting blisters and holes in all my socks. Even with snug fit.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe with yellow laces.
customer_reviews.text: Great, supported shoe. Wide enough for bunion feet/foot. Doesn't even feel like I am wearing shoes. Bring out the band!
customer_reviews.author: Andi

customer_reviews.title: They keep getting better.
customer_reviews.text: Had the instinct shoes since 1.0. They keep getting better.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Howard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My favorite running shoe. Will keep buying Altra because of their zero drop.design.
customer_reviews.author: D. Macgillis

customer_reviews.title: Cheap feeling will not try again.
customer_reviews.text: Too small, I read previous comments and I tried half a size larger and still too small. I don't like the shape inside it feels like a bump inside your feet. The inside is not completely flat.
customer_reviews.author: RODRIGO

customer_reviews.title: Reviews said Shure and small so I bought a half ...
customer_reviews.text: Reviews said Shure and small so I bought a half size bigger should have went with a full size I normally wear a size 10 and ultra running shoes have been wearing size 10 in ultra running shoes for the past 8 years. I should have ordered a size 11
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoe from Altra
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoe from Altra. Unfortunately, my left sneaker had some stitching issues on the tongue that became loose. Not much of an issue for me but shame I received a damaged item.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Altra makes by far the best shoes. Comfortable and durable
customer_reviews.author: Maren L

customer_reviews.title: Size issue
customer_reviews.text: All my men's Altras are size 10, but these 10s were too small. Too bad bc otherwise they're awesome!
customer_reviews.author: donut

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Have had for only 2 months and already falling apart. Not even every day use. Extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.author: cguido

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Need to order a full size larger, if you where a 12 order a 13
customer_reviews.author: Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Wide and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Perfect running shoes for those with wide feet. They were recommended to my husband on a specially running store and he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlet

customer_reviews.title: ... smaller than the Altra II's but are still a good shoe.
customer_reviews.text: These fit a tad smaller than the Altra II's but are still a good shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. T.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: cushioning very good and toe box more comfortable than old nikes and adidas.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce A. Divelbiss

customer_reviews.title: As expected.
customer_reviews.text: Heels wears out faster than most shoes but I don't go through the trouble of retying shoe
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: You need these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t want to run, or walk with anything else now.
customer_reviews.author: carl

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoes! I'm flat footed so it hurts after a run for while. After buying these shoes I can enjoy running again!
customer_reviews.author: Neil John

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I had to send them back. All of my Altra shoes I have purchased were 9 1/2 and they fit perfectly. These were 9 1/2 and were to small.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Raffo

customer_reviews.title: but they feel great. i like the zero drop and the wide ...
customer_reviews.text: i have only ran about 15 miles in them so far, but they feel great. i like the zero drop and the wide toe box.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Not a good choice. Wishing I would have returned the product ...
customer_reviews.text: Not a good choice. Wishing I would have returned the product immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just started to wear Altra and I love these. I usually wear New Balance 4 E ...
customer_reviews.text: Just started to wear Altra and I love these. I usually wear New Balance 4 E for the width but these fit great. I have two pairs before they change the style and I can't get them again...LOL ...I also have ALTRA TORIN 2.0.....Extra for a little more padding. So far i'm very happy.
customer_reviews.author: twofingers

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoes Altra must have changed their sizing
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes Altra must have changed their sizing. Bought the same as previous shoe but these were too small
customer_reviews.author: Walter Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love Altra products, but best to go 1/2 a size larger.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Craig

customer_reviews.title: The big issue with ordering online...
customer_reviews.text: Had thing issue with my shoes, seems someone blew it with the QC. My shoes arrived with 2 RIGHT foot insoles. I think they should send me 2 LEFT foot insoles as compensation for the problem!
customer_reviews.author: JWJ in the Smokies

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great intro into forefoot running they fit great. Nice wide toe box so my toes can splay. The zero drop really encourages forefoot running
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Kessebeh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This style is a half size too small. If ...
customer_reviews.text: This style is a half size too small. If you have used Altra shoes in the past, order a half size bigger in this style.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Fennelly

customer_reviews.title: Good design. Very cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: They have just arrived and I put them on. First impressions, before use. I've bought them half size up from my usual 10 and didn't regret. Spot on. Toe box is nice and wide. The best part of the shoe is the sole. It's got rubber layer and seems to be well designed, great cushioning. Disappointed with the rest of the shoe. Cheap materials all over, bad workmanship, too short laces that I had to replace immediately as they could hardly be tied together. Once I put my new laces on, that was the best quality material you could find on the shoe. Cheat, cheap, cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Nik

customer_reviews.title: Sole wearing out too quickly
customer_reviews.text: This shoe feels incredible. Snug, but roomy at the same time. The support is amazing. A huge leap in comfort over the Instinct 3.0. However, I hold this against it: I've only gone 45k in them in 2 weeks over 6 runs and the sole looks like it's several months old. I'm nervous about how long it will last, although the build quality appears much improved over the 3.0. The sole is wearing out way too quickly. I just bought these shoes!!!
customer_reviews.author: Omar C.

customer_reviews.title: Buy these Altra’s!  A great running shoe!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite shoes for long distance training. Will buy another pair for my Chicago Marathon run this Fall!

customer_reviews.text: Great pair of shoes. I can’t wait to order another pair.

customer_reviews.title: Go up a size
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 10.5 but in these I got 11.5
customer_reviews.author: Rc-Uly

product_meta.title: ALTRA Men's Instinct 4 Running Shoe
product_meta.description: Your favorite neutral do-it-all shoe returns, this time with notable and exciting upgrades designed to improve your running experience. This mid-cushioned favorite now provides even more protection and support. A decoupled heel promotes a soft landing while extra rubber wraps up to protect your toes. A modernized upper with engineered mesh makes for a more comfortable and secure fit. AND an updated midsole design keeps these Altra classics looking fresh and fast. Never break stride in the updated instinct 4.0.
feature_bullets: EVA with A-Bound Top Layer and InnerFlex Midsole
